nodes.text: Jedi artifacts, sometimes known as Jedi treasures, were priceless light side items, ancient in their creation but invaluable to Jedi for their potency and unique interaction with the light side of the Force. Jedi artifacts included Jedi holocrons, ancient Jedi lightsabers, Jedi Credits, Jedi scrolls or books, and even ancient Jedi robes, to name a few.
